> = > < = < watch.php.*?&(.*?)"[d\D\S].*?img src="(.*?)" w.*?=".*?" h.*?=".*?" b.*?=".*?"[d\D\S].*?>(.*?)< a href="(.*?)".*?background-image: url\((.*?)\)".*?movie_name roboto_regular">(.*?)(.*?)<.*?>

(.*?)< Test LSP EncKey! ignoreme MoziMozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux i686; rv:44.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/44.0 Iceweasel/44.0 http://pastebin.com/raw/xxxxxx$$LSProEncKey=xxxxx$$ TEST IgnoreME ----------- Stream fr $doregex[geturl] geturl (http.*?)" $doregex[getunpacked] getunpacked $pyFunction:get_unpacked(page_data,'(eval\(function\(p,a,c,k,e,d.*)' ) $doregex[getunescaped] getunescaped $pyFunction:urllib.unquote('$doregex[getdecoded]') getdecoded $pyFunction:base64.b64decode('$doregex[getEnc]') getEnc atob\(\"(.*?)\" http://en.iphone-tv.eu/stream/fr/8 ----------- select_Url $pyFunction: '$doregex[get_openload]' if not '$doregex[get_openload]'=='' else '$doregex[get_uptostream]' if not '$doregex[get_uptostream]'=='' else 'plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=CEGSitBJ7Gw' $doregex[getURL|User-Agent= getURL location.*(http.*?)[',"] > = > < = < //// ///// c>(.*?)<.*\n.*(http.*w).*\n.*\n.*\n.*\n.*(http.*)< > = > < = < ----------------------- $doregex[getsxtream] getsxtream ---------------------- TEST | URL= $doregex[get=URL]|User-Agent=iPhone get=URL #$pyFunction import requests, re def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = 'http://XXXXX.com/XXXXX/2675843/XXXXX/1839332'): headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0','Referer': 'http://XXXXX.com/'} source = requests.get(url, headers=headers) m3u8 = re.findall('ExpresherE', source.text)[0] return m3u8 + '|headers' ---------------------------- TEST | MAKELIST | URL= $doregex[list] list [list.param1] [list.param2] BANDWIDTH=([^\D]+).*\n.*(chunklist.*) ---------------------------------- AnimeYT $doregex[makelist] makelist [makelist.param1] $doregex[makelist2] option value="[A-Z]">(.*?)< ----------------------------------- select_Url $pyFunction: '$doregex[get_openload]' if not '$doregex[get_openload]'=='' else 'http://$doregex[get_uptostream]' if not '$doregex[get_uptostream]'=='' else 'plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=CEGSitBJ7Gw' ----------------------------------------
